column5: Hey guys fairly new to the forum been enjoying reading the threads and am a very avid angler, looking to insure my boat this year don't want to put it under the house or car policy , any recommendations on a good company to use ?
there is a thread that was recently going around that has some great information in it. search boat insurance
Thanks very much guys decided to go with harbour insurance after comparing all of them, appreciate the feedback!
That's who my new boat it with.   Just insured it this week so I've never had to make a claim but they were easy to deal with no survey, and few restrictions.
there is a thread that was recently going around that has some great information in it. search boat insurance Thanks LH, that was my post and I've gone with April Marine.
